description: Number of permutations of an n-set containing a 5-cycle.
formula: a(n) = n! (1 - sum(k=0...floor(n/5), (-1)^k/(k!*5^k)).a(n)/n! is asymptotic to 1-e^(-1/5) = 1 - A092618.E.g.f.: (1-exp(-x^5/5))/(1-x) - _Geoffrey Critzer_, Jun 01 2013
mathematica: nn = 20; a = Log[1/(1 - x)] - x^5/5;Range[0, nn]! CoefficientList[Series[1/(1 - x) - Exp[a], {x, 0, nn}],x](* _Geoffrey Critzer_, Jun 01 2013 *)
author: _Rob Pratt_
